sourceOfFunds.purpose: The organization has been established in the year 2016-17 with a vision of upliftment and development of all by creating harmony between human -beings and nature . The organization aims at undertaking seven key actions in phased manner . In the first phase, an action plan has been prepared to focus on enhancing literacy in the society through an voluntary movement of identifying Swyam Sevi Sarvautthanak (SSS). Various sources of fund will be mobilized for undertaking activities of phase I.

An interactive web portal of the organization has been developed for seeking financial funding and registering Swyam Sevi Sarvautthanak (SSS). For starting the activities of phase I, funds by donations will be mobilized. However, our emphasis will be to generate funds through external grant from donor agencies such as Government , International organizations, private firms etc.

detailsOfAchievement: Centered activity of this Trust to emphasis establishing and maintaining lecture halls boarding house libraries reading rooms Regular seminars work shops and paper presentations and regular assistance to students to perform well Shah Safi Memorial Trust also runs courses under name of Hifz Tahtania Munshi Fazil together with NCERT English Mathematics Science up to 12th standard Hindi Urdu Persian and Computer education is mandatory for all these courses subject to National standard Few students been provided training for Secretarial practices Computer operation in MS Office In Page DTP etc as well typing and language conversion ability in Urdu Hindi English Provisions have been enacted so that people hailing from all communities of society can avail themselves of education and share knowledge with each other Communal Harmony program been organized every month and considerable audience from all communities participate which is a good example for communal harmony and peace Trust also donates to some educational institution organizations society to support them for working for betterment of society Trust also promote the retain our cultural and heritage in which Sufi music program been organized frequently Trust also organize Health checkup camps for the needy and poor eradication of polio free distribution of medicines Trust also help in poor girls marriages program As parents faces difficulties in choosing mates for their girls To minimize this burden of such poor parents trust helped financially to these parents Scholarship are being awarded on merit basis to encourage and motivate these students Trust also help and support those Old age persons or elderly persons who lost their home
